SEARCH
Module sc2002.scmb.grp1.hms
Package repository

Class AvailabilityRepository

java.lang.Object
repository.AvailabilityRepository
public class AvailabilityRepository extends Object
The AvailabilityRepository class manages the availability data of doctors. It provides methods to load, filter, add, and delete availabilities from a CSV file.

  • Method Details

    • loadAllAvailabilities

      public List<Availability> loadAllAvailabilities() throws IOException
      Loads all availability records from the CSV file.
      Returns:
      A list of all Availability objects.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while reading the file.

    • getAvailabilityByDoctorId

      public List<Availability> getAvailabilityByDoctorId(String doctorId) throws IOException
      Retrieves availabilities for a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - The ID of the doctor.
      Returns:
      A list of Availability objects for the specified doctor.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while reading the file.

    • createNewAvailability

      public void createNewAvailability(Availability availability) throws IOException
      Creates a new availability record and appends it to the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      availability - The Availability object to add.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while writing to the file.

    • getLastAvailId

      public String getLastAvailId() throws IOException
      Retrieves the ID of the last availability record.
      Returns:
      The last available ID, or "AV000" if no records exist.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while reading the file.

    • getAvailabilityById

      public Availability getAvailabilityById(String availabilityId) throws IOException
      Retrieves an availability by its ID.
      Parameters:
      availabilityId - The ID of the availability to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Availability object, or null if not found.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while reading the file.

    • deleteAvailabilityById

      public void deleteAvailabilityById(String availabilityId) throws IOException
      Deletes an availability by its ID.
      Parameters:
      availabilityId - The ID of the availability to delete.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while writing to the file.
